name: Cards - A Mystery Story
description:
...at this point he couldn't care less anymore. It had dragged on too long, and he wanted it to end. Home is a lonely drink-hole.

"Cards - A Mystery Story" is a short mystery fiction where the story & game play takes place in the player's mind. Take it slow and look for clues (non-existent or otherwise). There are no wrong choices in the game. Everything  is open-ended to invite you to craft your own mystery story.

Controls:

Use your mouse to left-click on the card and drag it around. That's it!

Note:

Hello! This is my second game jam, inspired by mystery stories, magic, and noir. Submitted for Easy Jam (8 Bits to Infinity), I hope you all will give it a go and be entertained for a few minutes! 

- returntosender
